ARABIC: مَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They do not measure Allah with His true measure. Allah is All-Strong, Almighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They do not esteem God with the right estimation. God is surely all-powerful and all-mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They have not formed a true estimate of Allah. Indeed, Allah is All-Powerful, All-Mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They have not revered God properly. God is All-powerful and Majestic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They did not realise the importance of Allah as was His right; indeed Allah is Almighty, Dominant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They have not regarded Allah with His rightful esteem. Verily, Allah is All-Strong, All-Mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They have not estimated Allah with the estimation that i due to Him; most surely Allah is Strong, Mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They measure not God with His true measure; surely God is All-strong, All-mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They measure not Allah His rightful measure. Lo! Allah is Strong, Almighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: No just estimate have they made of God. Surely God is powerful and mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They have not estimated Allah His rightful estimate; verily Allah is strong, Mighty!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They do not regard Allah with the regard due to Him. Indeed Allah is all-strong, all-mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: No just estimate have they made of Allah: for Allah is He Who is strong and able to Carry out His Will.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They have not estimated Allah His Rightful Estimate; Verily, Allah is All-Strong, All-Mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They do not value Allah as He should be valued. For Allah is Powerful and Mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They do not value God as He should be valued. God is Strong and Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [22:74] They do not esteem God, exalt Him, with the esteem He deserves, with the exaltedness [He deserves], for they ascribe to Him partners who can neither protect themselves from a fly, nor retaliate against it. Truly God is Strong, Mighty, Victor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They measure not Allah His rightful measure) they do not magnify Allah as He deserves to be magnified. This was revealed about the Jews when they claimed that 'Uzayr was the son of God, and due to their sayings: "Allah is poor while we are rich,", "Allah's hands are tight because of miserliness" and that Allah rested after He finished creating the heavens and the earth. (Lo! Allah is Strong) against His enemies, (Almighty) He is Mighty in His vengeance against the Jews.
